text: Pedro José Pérez González (born 21 February 1986), also known as Pxa, is a Spanish businessman, body piercer, and talent manager from Pontevedra, Galicia. He is best known as the founder and owner of Pxa Body Art, a tattoo and piercing studio that has gained international recognition, particularly for its realistic tattoo style. Pxa is also known for his work managing tattoo artists and for holding records related to body piercings. https://dictionary.cambridge.org/dictionary/english/piercer https://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/pierce https://www.merriam- webster.com/dictionary/piercing https://dictionary.cambridge.org/dictionary/english/pierce https://www.forbes.com.mx/pedro-jose-perez-el-genio-detras-de-pxabody-art-y- los-tatuajes-de-las- celebridades/?fbclid=IwAR3qAolPo1EZIG9OItstorgYVOsJFzzV_Ikdip3L1YAMVqx9gls8BsWvTk0 https://pxabodyart.com/https://web.archive.org/web/20200420005432/https://www.stockton.gov.uk/media/2117/tab- body-piercing-client-consent-form.pdf http://www.austlii.edu.au/au/legis/wa/consol_act/cacsa2004318/s104a.html https://web.archive.org/web/20130419203855/http://www.dcp.wa.gov.au/ChildProtection/Documents/Piercing/PiercingConsentForm.pdf https://www.proquest.com/docview/337133263 https://www.lexology.com/library/detail.aspx?g=eb667520-ab2c-43b8-bd43-2ec2290941bd https://web.archive.org/web/20110313010127/http://www.public.health.wa.gov.au/cproot/1469/2/Use_of_Ear_Piercing_Guns.pdf https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC8535423 https://web.archive.org/web/20201228055005/https://www.theleatherjournal.com/pantheon- awards/recipients ==Early life== Pedro José Pérez González was born in Pontevedra, Spain, on 21 February 1986. His parents are Marta González and Germán Pérez. He has two siblings, Alberto Pérez and Susana Pérez. From a young age, Pedro showed interest in business. At the age of 13, he began distributing flyers to earn money. A year later, at 14, he started selling clothes on digital platforms. When he was 16, he got his first stable job as a waiter. During this time, he became interested in body piercing and began to learn the trade. https://cpb-us- west-2-juc1ugur1qwqqqo4.stackpathdns.com/hawksites.newpaltz.edu/dist/1/2245/files/2018/01/Yuen- Thompson_Heavily-Tattooed-Women-1cyuu89.pdf https://acd.clld.org/cognatesets/31345#3/-11.94/168.74 https://books.google.com/books?id=ZalJDAAAQBAJ&pg;=PA97 https://web.archive.org/web/20101223231358/http://www.aad.org/public/Publications/pamphlets/cosmetic_tattoos.html https://web.archive.org/web/20170907093923/http://www.ncemi.org/cse/cse1018.htm https://www.ushmm.org/wlc/en/article.php?ModuleId=10007056 https://collections.ushmm.org/search/catalog/pa6838 https://collections.ushmm.org/search/catalog/irn616441 https://encyclopedia.ushmm.org/content/en/article/tattoos-and-numbers-the- system-of-identifying-prisoners-at-auschwitz http://web.prm.ox.ac.uk/bodyarts/index.php/body-arts-and- lifecycles/adulthood/105-prisoners-tag.html https://www2.law.temple.edu/10q/tattoo-recognition-technology-gaining- acceptance-as-a-crime-solving- technique/#:~:text=Tattoos%20are%20also%20helpful%20in,attempt%20to%20mutilate%20the%20body https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4411590 http://randd.defra.gov.uk/Document.aspx?Document=11417_IdentificationandTraceabilityFinal.pdf. https://www.gov.uk/government/news/compulsory-dog-microchipping-comes-into- effect https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/magazine-25366749 http://www.hurriyetdailynews.com/tattooist-offers-to-tattoo-names-of- alzheimer-patients-in-izmir.aspx?pageID=238&nID;=71786 http://blogs.ucl.ac.uk/researchers-in-museums/2012/12/10/tattooed-mummy- amunet/ ==Career== At 17, Pedro was hired by one of the five piercing studios in his city. Within a short time, he was working at four out of the five shops in Pontevedra. He quickly built a loyal customer base, gaining experience and recognition in the local piercing scene. In 2008, at the age of 22, he opened his own studio, Pxa Body Art, on 11 September. The studio was the first in Galicia to specialize in realistic tattoos, a style focused on highly detailed and lifelike designs. Over the years, Pedro has performed more than 28,000 piercings. He also shares his knowledge through seminars and training sessions held at his studio, helping others enter the piercing profession. https://link.springer.com/chapter/10.1007%2F978-3-030-32181-9_6 http://smithsonianscience.si.edu/2015/12/debate-over-worlds-oldest-tattoo-is- over-for-now/ https://books.google.com/books?id=VFJpUG5Nzh4C&pg;=PA31 https://books.google.com/books?id=RKZGDwAAQBAJ&pg;=PT171 https://web.archive.org/web/20140519211810/http://ethnicjewelsmagazine.com/facial- tattooing-of-berber-women-by-sarah-corbett/ https://www.researchgate.net/publication/362024307 https://pure.qub.ac.uk/en/publications/8a368c3c-d138-4a04-a203-fef01b8ed673 https://doi.org/10.5334%2Fpia.200 https://www.esquiremag.ph/long- reads/features/the-true-story-of-the-mindanaoan-slave-whose-skin-was- displayed-at-oxford-a00029-20171102-lfrm2 https://www.rmg.co.uk/discover/explore/captain-cook-sir-joseph-banks-and- tattoos-tahiti https://www.jstor.org/stable/986875 https://books.google.com/books?id=fDsHKydL67kC&q;=%22protection%20papers%22%20slavery&pg;=PA305 https://www.washingtonpost.com/archive/local/1980/11/09/original-tattoo- artist-times-changing/99616353-ba75-477d-822c-4aeaf062d17a/ https://www.chicagotribune.com/news/ct-xpm-2006-05-11-0605110139-story.html https://muslimversity.com/are-tattoos-haram/ https://hellogiggles.com/beauty/are-tattoos-haram/ https://www.nytimes.com/2008/07/17/fashion/17SKIN.html http://websterjournal.com/2018/10/31/opinions-on-tattoos-differ-by-religion/ https://www.advdermatology.com/blog/statistics-surrounding-tattoo-regret/ https://www.pewresearch.org/short-reads/2023/08/15/32-of-americans-have-a- tattoo-including-22-who-have-more-than-one/ https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC11499570 https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC11736920 https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC11141277 ==Records== Pedro holds two records in the piercing field: * 334 piercings performed in one day. * 649 piercings performed in two consecutive days. These achievements have helped raise his profile nationally and internationally. https://www.sundaypost.com/fp/forgotten-scots-explorer-and-artist-who- sketched-for-captain-cook-expedition-hailed/ http://tattoohistorian.com/2014/04/05/the-cook-myth-common-tattoo-history- debunked/ https://indiancountrytoday.com/archive/native-american-tattoos- influenced-body-art-industry http://www.mayoclinic.com/health/tattoos-and- piercings/MC00020 http://www.telegram.com/article/20130219/NEWS/102199933/0 ==Ponte Láser== In 2023, Pedro founded Ponte Láser, a company dedicated to tattoo removal using laser technology. The company quickly expanded and began offering services in over 30 tattoo and beauty centers across Galicia.
